meanings.definition: A route or way for traveling from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The forest had many pathways for us to explore.
meanings.sent2: The pathways in the park were well-marked and easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The pathways in the maze confused the little mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a pathway to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The pathways through the mountains were treacherous but breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A course of action or method followed in order to achieve a particular result.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to change their marketing pathways to increase sales.
meanings.sent2: Following the pathways of successful entrepreneurs can lead to business growth.
meanings.sent3: His pathway to success involved hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent4: The pathway to happiness is different for everyone.
meanings.sent5: Choosing the right pathway can make all the difference in reaching your goals.
